verses.roman:
śrī-kṛṣṇa-caitanya gosāñi vrajendra-kumāra
rasa-maya-mūrti kṛṣṇa sākṣāt śṛṅgāra

synonyms: śrī-kṛṣṇa-caitanya gosāñi—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; vrajendra-kumāra—the child of King Nanda; rasa-maya—consisting of mellows; mūrti—the form; kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; sākṣāt—directly; śṛṅgāra—amorous love.
translation: Lord Śrī Kṛṣṇa Caitanya is Kṛṣṇa [Vrajendra-kumāra], the embodiment of rasas. He is amorous love personified.
